description: This Kotlin source file provides focus management helpers for Android TV applications using Jetpack Compose. It defines a singleton object TVFocus with a method to create and remember a FocusRequester for initial focus, and an extension function dpadFocusable() that enhances UI components with focusability, visual cues, and key event handling for DPAD navigation.

classes.name: TVFocus
classes.description: A singleton object providing focus management utilities for TV interfaces, including creating and remembering FocusRequester instances.

methods.name: rememberFirstItemFocusRequester
methods.description: Creates and remembers a FocusRequester for setting initial focus on the first focusable element.

methods.name: dpadFocusable
methods.description: An extension function on Modifier that makes a UI element focusable, provides visual focus feedback via scaling and padding, and sets up key event handling for DPAD navigation and selection.
